entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
